General.Name: Curro Hol
General.Description: Curro Holdings Limited develops, acquires, and manages independent schools in Southern Africa. The company operates through Curroa and Meridian segments. It operates Curro Preschools, Curro, Curro Academy, Meridian, Select, Curro Assisted Learning, Curro DigiEd, Curro Private College, and Curro Online schools for learners from the age of three months to Grade 12. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Durbanville, South Africa. Curro Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of PSG Group Ltd.
